entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-09-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Upgrading Azure Function v4 from net6 to net7 System.Threading version 7 throws FileNotFoundException #92542
  • Add IsUnreferencedCodeAvailable feature switch #92541
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Invalid smnegl transformation #92537
    9.0.0
  • Standalone GC, GC_IsCompatibleWithRuntime(), building a standalone GC for multiple runtime versions #92536
  • Array of multidimensional arrays has wrong name #92535
  • 8.0 Performance regression #92530
  • [API Proposal]: Add source-generator for enum type #92529
  • Sometimes `testhost/CoreRun` crashes with `System.Diagnostics.Tracing`-related assertion failure #92519
  • System.Management.Tests fail with System.Management.ManagementException #92518

Closed

  • Exception unwinding broken with Xcode 15 linker #92297
  • [tvos] System.Runtime.Loader.Test.AssemblyNotSupported could not be loaded #92522
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'targetReg != op2Reg' during 'Generate code' #91209
    8.0.0
  • Random Constructors with `seed` parameter is wrong naming convention, it should be `Seed` -> `seed` parameter name #92517
  • Generic method static virtuals with default implementation behaves fails to compile #89101
    9.0.0
  • Incorrect value after truncating cast #92349
    8.0.0
  • [RyuJIT][LSRA] Take register encoding sizes into account #7996
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Make CoreCLR/NativeAOT assembly compile with .subsections_via_symbols on Apple platforms #92544
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Convert tests under GC subtree to the merged test model #92543
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • JIT: Register field seqs for GC pointer constants in side table #92540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use invariant culture for CBOR #92539
    area-System.Formats.Cbor, community-contribution
  • Implement InitialCapacity on CborWriter. #92538
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Formats.Cbor
  • Improve and unify debug views of dictionaries. #92534
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Fix doc comment #92531
    community-contribution, area-System.DateTime
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • Make `TypeDescriptor` thread safe with custom providers #92521
    area-System.ComponentModel, community-contribution
  • Add 5 min timeout to VSIX update checks and validate installation state #92516
    area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0-rc2' => 'release/8.0' #92515
    needs-area-label
  • Improve nullability check for generic `.ctor` parameters #92514
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0] JIT: Fixed containment of STOREIND of HW intrinsics ConvertTo* #92513
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Make CoreCLR/NativeAOT assembly compile with .subsections_via_symbols on Apple platforms #92520
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use snprintf in pal_icushim.c #92452
    area-System.Globalization, 9.0.0
  • Convert a few reflection FCalls to C# #92512
    area-System.Reflection
  • Fix tvOS builds. #92525
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • Fix asserts about arm64 hardware intrinsic register selection #92505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Rename get_* to Get* in NativeAOT runtime #92498
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove blocking on a test for native AOT #91781
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Delete FEATURE_MANAGED_ETW_* defines for unmanaged code #92493
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-rc2] `IDispatch` should accept `HRESULT` as valuetype #92494
    Servicing-approved, area-Interop-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fixed containment of STOREIND of HW intrinsics ConvertTo* #92396
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [mono] Generate gsharedvt versions of the callvirt delegate invoke wr… #92472
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Extend preinitialization interpreter #92470
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][infra] Use llvm toolchain instead of binutils on linux #92057
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Fix #91958: use `mach_timebase_info` to determine process time coefficient on macOS #92185
    area-System.Diagnostics.Process, os-mac-os-x, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Reduce allocations in `BinaryReader`. #80331
    area-System.IO, tenet-performance, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Optimize capturing lambdas in `DependencyContextExtensions` and `DependencyContextJsonReader` #92462
    area-DependencyModel, community-contribution
  • [browser] dispose runtime #92480
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Support SIMD sizes for remainders in store decomposition #92469
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Avoiding trying to load the native library Microsoft.DiaSymReader.Native.<arch>.dll on Linux #92492
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [IGNORE][wasm] wasm symbols #91241
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Memory mapped stresslog for NativeAOT #92506
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
